name: SiNG PARTY™
description: Get ready for SiNG PARTY, an all-new singing-and-dancing game that creates an instant party in your living room! In Party Mode, the lead singers read the song lyrics on the Wii U™ GamePad controller, allowing them to face the audience and move around the living room instead of staring at the TV. The audience joins in the fun by following cues, singing background vocals and dancing with the moves shown on the TV screen. In Sing Mode, players sing solo or as a duet with harmonies. Vocal qualities are scored and evaluated on the TV in real time. In Team Mode, players face off against their musical rivals as they rotate through different game modes. The game includes music from many genres and eras, to create the perfect party playlist. Artists include Rihanna, Jackson 5, Lady Gaga, The Wanted, James Brown, The Village People and Selena Gomez & The Scene, and more!
